Title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning
Writer: Sheldon Turner (screenplay), Sheldon Turner (story), David J. Schow (story)
Actors: Jordana Brewster, Taylor Handley, Diora Baird, Matt Bomer
Plot: Before being sent to serve in Vietnam, two brothers and their girlfriends take one last road trip, but when they get into an accident, a terrifying experience will take them to a secluded house of horrors, with a chainsaw-wielding killer.
Production: New Line Cinema, Texas Chainsaw Productions, Platinum Dunes
